res, outfile = ipmag.atrm_magic('atrm_measurements3.txt', input_dir_path=
    self.atrm_WD, input_spec_file='orig_specimens.txt', output_spec_file=
    'custom_specimens.txt')
self.assertTrue(res)
self.assertEqual(outfile, os.path.realpath(os.path.join('.',
    'custom_specimens.txt')))
df = cb.MagicDataFrame(outfile)
self.assertTrue(any(df.df['sample']))
